Translations.Text: Apani ki jenechena (ebam ascarya hayechena) se byakti samparke, ye amadera ayatasamuhe kuphari kare ebam bale, ‘amake abasya'i dhana-sampada o santana-santati deya habe
Se ki gayeba dekhe niyeche, naki dayamayera kacha theke pratisruti labha kareche
kakhana'i naya, se ya bale amara ta likhe rakhaba ebam tamra sasti brd'dha'i karate thakaba
Ara se ya bale ta thakabe amadera adhikare [1] ebam se amadera kache asabe eka
Ara tara allah chara an'ya bahu ilaha grahana kareche, yate ora tadera sahaya haya
Kakhana'i naya, ora to tadera ibadata asbikara karabe ebam tadera birodhi haye yabe
Apani ki laksya karenani ye, amara kapheradera jan'ya sayatanaderake chere rekhechi, taderake manda kaje bisesabhabe pralubdha karara jan'ya
kaje'i tadera bisaye apani taratari karabena na. Amara to gunachi tadera nirdharita kala
yedina dayamayera nikata muttakiganake sam'manita mehamanarupe [1] amara samabeta karaba
ebam aparadhiderake trsnatura abasthaya jahannamera dike hamkiye niye yabo
Yara dayamayera kacha theke pratisruti niyeche, tara chara ke'u suparisa karara malika habe na
Ara tara bale, ‘dayamaya santana grahana karechena’
Tomara to emana eka bibhatsa bisayera abatarana karacha
yate asamanasamuha bidirna haye ya'oyara upakrama haya, ara yamina khanda-bikhanda ebam parbatamandali curna-bicurna haye apatita habe
e jan'ya ye, tara dayamayera prati santana arapa kare
Athaca santana grahana kara dayamayera jan'ya sobhana naya
asamanasamuha o yamine emana ke'u ne'i, ye dayamayera kache bandarupe upasthita habe na
Tini tadera sankhya janena ebam tini taderake bisesabhabe gune rekhechena
Ara kiyamatera dina tadera saba'i tamra kache asabe ekaki abasthaya
